content: I'm so excited to visit Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge! I've heard the theming and attention to detail are incredible. I'll definitely download the Disneyland app and plan my outfit beforehand. I'm also looking forward to trying the Ronto Wrap and Carbon Freeze Pops. Can you tell me more about the Datapad and how it works? I've heard it's a really cool interactive experience, but I'm not sure how to participate.
